content.text:
# 7th Canadian Folk Music Awards

-->
| location       = Isabel Bader Theatre, Toronto, Ontario
| country        = Canada
| reward         =
| year           =
| year2          =
| holder         =
| website        = [http://folkawards.ca/ folkawards.ca]

The 7th Canadian Folk Music Awards were held on December 4, 2011, at the Isabel Bader Theatre in Toronto, Ontario.
Nominees and recipients
Recipients are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
{| class=wikitable width="100%"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Traditional Album
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Contemporary Album
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Genticorum - Nagez Rameurs'
* Dave Gunning - ...a tribute to John Allan Cameron
* Finest Kind - For Honour and For Gain
* De Temps Antan - Les Habits de Papier
* La Volée d'Castors - Le Retour
| valign="top" |
* 'Bruce Cockburn - Small Source of Comfort'
* Twilight Hotel - When the Wolves Go Blind
* Les Charbonniers de l'enfer - Nouvelles fréquentations
* Lynn Miles - Fall for Beauty
* The Good Lovelies - Let The Rain Fall
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Children's Album
